metadata.title: CVE-2023-31919 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: Jerryscript 3.0 (commit 05dbbd1) was discovered to contain an AssertionFailure via the jcontext_raise_exception at jerry-core/jcontext/jcontext.c.

criterions.comment: iotjs: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
